dialogueLines.line: Where am I?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Welcome, young one, to the very domain of yours truly.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: I must say, I'm quite surprised you of all people managed to make it here.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Uh, who are you?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Hmph, well I suppose a troglodyte like you wouldn't ever be acquainted with someone of my prestige.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Girlfriend, do you know who this is?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Nope, not at all.
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: I am PRIS-ma, a distinguished being from the third dimension.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: I'm kinda hungry.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: You wanna get some burgers after this?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: Now, I decided to take a page out of a certain grey cube's book, and brought a bunch of you lowly second dimension folk together into a single playground of mine.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: However, I decided to take a more passive approach, and let all of you savages fight each other for my own amusement.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: This whole time, you thought you were travelling around different places, but all you were doing was walking circles inside this very room you see here!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Is that thing made of glass?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: I think I can see my own reflection.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: But I know what you're asking...you've passed through many different, varying sights on the way here, so how can I claim that it was all just in one room?
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Through the power of illusion, of course!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Now, if you want to ever make it back home, you must-
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Wait, does this mean we don't get the $75,000
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Of course not! That rap tournament flyer was just a ruse to bring you here to my-.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: What does PRIS-ma stand for?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: Huh? It doesn't stand for anything. My name is PRIS-ma. You know, like a prism?
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: I don't get it.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: I don't get it either.
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: What? How do you not get it! Haven't you ever seen a triangular prism before!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: A triangle what now?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: ARE YOU MADE OF OSMIUM? BECAUSE GOD, YOU ARE SO DENSE!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Oh, haha. I get it, because osmium is the densest element on the periodic table.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: THAT'S WHAT YOU GET?
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: You know what? Whatever, let's just skip to the part where we rap battle with your freedom on the line.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Sounds good to me!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf
